metadata.title: CVE-2017-8284 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The disas_insn function in target/i386/translate.c in QEMUbefore 2.9.0, when TCG mode without hardware acceleration is used, does notlimit the instruction size, which allows local users to gain privileges bycreating a modified basic block that injects code into a setuid program, asdemonstrated by procmail. NOTE: the vendor has stated "this bug does notviolate any security guarantees QEMU makes."

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
